data.name: Sports and Entertainment
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall contains a wide variety of major sports stores.

data.name: Restaurants
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall offers a great selection of restaurants that offer what suits all tastes, from contemporary Arabic dishes and many more to live a delicious tasting experience.

data.name: Pharmacies - Cosmetics - Perfumes - Beauties
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall provides you with a lot of options from skin care products to cosmetics, and perfumes. You will find in the mall what satisfies your taste and gives you the perfect look.

data.name: Women - Men's Fashion
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall contains stores that sell the finest brands and the latest collections of various modern and classic designs suitable for both genders and meet the needs of everyone.

data.name: Games - gifts - stationery - books
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall contains a wide range of stores specialized in Kids' toys and other gifts to suit all your occasions.
